constructor.head: Collection not provided to a constructor
moreInfo: You must include the collection in the CRUD method performed on the instance (as a parameter)
in order to succesfuly perform a CRUD action.

method.head: Collection not provided to a CRUD method
moreInfo: The collection object was not set on the constructor
nor it was passed to the CRUD method
the action can not be performed!

constructor.head: Invalid collection supplied to the constructor
moreInfo: is not not a valid MongoDB collection.

method.head: Invalid collection supplied to the method
moreInfo: Collection supplied to the CRUD method
is not not a valid MongoDB collection.

multipleCollections.head: Multiple collections supplied
moreInfo: The collection is already set on the constructor.
The constructor instance collection, will be overwritten
by the collection supplied to the CRUD method.
